sentence: And we are sure you’ll enjoy your time ______ us.
Our tour routes are the most comprehensive way to see ______ best London has to offer
It includes the panoramic views ______ seven bridges
There ______ a full commentary in English and a choice of six other languages.
Unlike some other companies, your tickets ______ completely unrestricted.
Each route includes frequent stops – simply hop off ______ you want to and return to the same stop
We strongly recommend that first timers start the tour at one of ______ main departure points
You may then choose ______ stay on the bus for a complete tour
Tickets are valid ______ the same time the following day.
In Britain, ______ than 20 people have been injured in an annual cheese-chasing contest.
That is the cost ______ victory, apparently.
